Replit.title: Replit
Replit.name: Stickers & Merch Store Discount
Replit.description: We can send Replit stickers, please provide one shipping address to send them to. As well as 15% off ReplShop.
Replit.access: Get 15% off your entire order using the promo code ReplitHackathon at checkout

Vercel.title: Vercel
Vercel.name: Vercel Free Tier
Vercel.description: Vercel offers a 100% free tier, perfect for Hackathons, to get your React, Vue, Svelte, Nuxt, Next.js, or similar projects deployed to the Web.

Skydio.title: Skydio
Skydio.name: Loaner Drones
Skydio.access: Skydio will bring drones for you to use!

Cadence.title: Cadence
Cadence.name: Cadence in the Cloud
Cadence.description: The Cadence OnCloud Platform offers easy cloud-based access to comprehensive, scalable software solutions for your specific engineering discipline, PCB design, multiphysics analysis, and computational fluid dynamics (CFD) analysis.

Wolfram.title: Wolfram
Wolfram.name: Wolfram|One
Wolfram.description: Access to both Desktop and Cloud, Wolfram Language, Knowledgebase, FreeCDF deployment, 5000 Wolfram|Alpha API calls, 5000 Cloud Credits, 2 installations per user, and 2 GB of Cloud Storage for 30 days.
Wolfram.access: You will receive an email 36-48 hours before the hackathon

Twilio.title: Twilio
Twilio.name: Twilio credit
Twilio.description: Promo code, each hacker receives 30 dollars worth of Twilio credit which should last for a year
Twilio.access: All hackers can receive the promo code

Pear VC.title: Pear VC
Pear VC.name: Fast track interview for a $100k Uncapped SAFE via Pear Competition
Pear VC.description: Winners get fast-tracked to win upto a $100k Uncapped SAFE via Pear Competition (https://pear.vc/competition)
Pear VC.access: Winners will receive an email from Udit Jain at Pear about next steps

Modal.title: Modal
Modal.name: 500$ in Modal API credits
Modal.description: Modal compute credits that can be used towards GPU inference, training, compute jobs and hosting web APIs.
Modal.access: Sign up here for credits and to get taken off the waitlist
